name: Powershell Store File In Alternate Data Stream
description: Storing files in Alternate Data Stream (ADS) similar to Astaroth malware.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(powershell.file.script_block_text:*Start\-Process* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*\-FilePath\ \"$env\:comspec\"\ * AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*\-ArgumentList\ * AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*>*)`
